Requirements You have a creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Grabbed]{Grabbed}.

You pummel a held foe, hoping to stagger them. Make a melee Strike against a creature you have grabbed. The weapon damage from this Strike is bludgeoning damage.

If the Strike hits, the creature must attempt a Fortitude save against your class DC; this is an incapacitation effect.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Stunned]{Stunned 1}.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Stunned]{Stunned 2}.

Critical Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Stunned]{Stunned 3}.
